Text saved: Most people believe that developing countries are in a terrible situation, experiencing great **poverty**, which is a situation where people do not have enough money for basic things like food or a home. They also think these countries are ruled by dictators and have little hope for any real change. However, this is not true. The real situation is that a big change is happening. Over the past 20 years, more than 700 million people have earned more money and have left poverty. In addition, six million fewer children die every year from disease, and millions more girls are now in school. Also, millions of people can get clean water.
